name: Jump to – Page Edit
author: zach_rww

sections.description: Adds an option to the “Edit Page” screen, allowing the user to easily choose another page to edit without leaving the “Edit Page” screen.
sections.installation:
1. Upload this plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and unzip it, or simply upload the zip file within your wordpress installation.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq: No FAQ with this release… so far.
sections.changelog:
02/12/2013: Version 2.0 – Updating readme.txt and is cleared for WordPress v. 3.5.1 // also adding screenshot!

11/28/2012: Version 1.0.1 – Updated plugin to fix problems occurring upon Pages being saved.
~ Custom Meta info was being altered.
~ My apologies.
~ “Jump to – Page Edit” will use a Custom Meta Field, jump_to_page_edit.
~ Because the selection of an option from the “Jump to – Page Edit” list does not actually require data to be saved to the current Page, the value of the Custom Meta Key ‘jump_to_page_edit’ does not need to be altered.

11/24/2012: Version 1.0 submission to WordPress.org

short_description: Adds an option to the "Edit Page" screen, allowing the user to easily choose another page to edit without leaving the "Edit Page"  …
description: Adds an option to the “Edit Page” screen, allowing the user to easily choose another page to edit without leaving the “Edit Page” screen.

screenshots.caption: [Just select another page from the Jump to - Page Edit menu and jump to another page to edit!]
